channel.title: Help me with runserver
channel.description:
Alright i finally finished my server and i compiled it, everything was fine on compile but then when i went to run it it had this error~
Crossislez Compiler and runner 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Crossislez v.2~ Brought to you by Demon: 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang. NumberFormatException: For input String: "2883"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(UnknownSource) at java.lang.integer.parseInt(UnknownSource) at java.lang.integer.parseInt(UnknownSource) at NPCHandler. loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.Java.1086) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.Java:29) at server.main(server.java:26)
Then when i copyed it said~ Terminate Batch Job (y/n)
Please help idk what this means and idk what to do... if anyone can help please do, thanks alot! :(

item.title: Help me with runserver
item.dc:creator: @Diablo_II Diablo II
item.description:
@Diablo_II wrote:

umm that didnt work, anyone else no?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with runserver
item.dc:creator: @shawn_is_back shawn is back
item.description:
@shawn_is_back wrote:

ok the problom is in autospawn.cfg just delete all the descriptions and it should work fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with runserver
item.dc:creator: @Diablo_II Diablo II
item.description:
@Diablo_II wrote:

Alright i finally finished my server and i compiled it, everything was fine on compile but then when i went to run it it had this error~

Crossislez Compiler and runner
‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Crossislez v.2~ Brought to you by Demon: 43594
Exception in thread “main” java.lang. NumberFormatException: For input String: “2883”

                       at java.lang.integer.parseInt(UnknownSource)	
                       at NPCHandler. loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.Java.1086)

                       at server.main(server.java:26)

Then when i copyed it said~ Terminate Batch Job (y/n)

Please help idk what this means and idk what to do… if anyone can help please do, thanks alot!
